documents.document: @geekboy73 Silverstream now. I’m the suburban spaceman.
@geekboy73 I’ve heard that.
@FlicksNZ @geekboy73 Luckily @radionz is a national radio station and I’ve already seen it.
@geekboy73 @FlicksNZ Bugger. I wanted to talk about it on @radionz on Sunday. The other options this week are unexciting.
@FlicksNZ I’m searching for FENCES which appears to have dropped off the schedule.
@FlicksNZ Search crashes the app at the moment. iPhone 6S iOS 10.
This is most excellent news. https://t.co/BKHyJLSWfh
@neverrepeats Bless. Looking forward to it!
@neverrepeats Can you wait until after the @RanchoPodcast episode goes up?
I really enjoy these weekly chats and I hope you do too. https://t.co/5oZMT2Uxbr
Missed this in all the fuss: “For those who don’t have our back, we’re taking names.” Trump’s new UN ambassador. https://t.co/ACuBgEBDJu
Tonight’s Hollywood at Home: EUROPA, EUROPA (Holland, 90). @fatsoDVD DVD. #52filmsbywomen
@clarerawlinson Reboot seems to have fixed it and there was no identifying info in the two photos I looked at so no way to warn the owner.
I use Back to My Mac to connect to home computer. Today it linked me to Photos folder belonging to a complete stranger. This is concerning.
Had a good chat with Lynn Freeman on @radionz Standing Room Only earlier: current releases, John Hurt and Farhadi. https://t.co/t48rBRc4AG
Was thinking something similar. https://t.co/G6SG5nfSQT
@AmesburyCassie I think Buenos Aires might be the beneficiary. Air NZ fluting direct and all that.
Plan for our first big trip as a married couple was either @TellurideFilm or NYC. We won’t visit USA again until this regime is over.
@SarahMcMullanNZ Oh, crap… I’d forgotten that. Another reason to put off re-watching WD for a few more weeks.
Tonight’s Hollywood at Home: ALIEN 3 (Fincher, 92). From the Alien Quadrilogy Blu-ray box set.
@SportsJonny @hudsie42 @peterdarlington Quite superbly, the Fiver calls Snodgrass “the Glasgow Garrincha”. Made my day.
@hudsie42 @peterdarlington If we had Payet Snodgrass wouldn’t get in the team.
@AdamGoodallYes Awesome avatar by the way.
@AdamGoodallYes @dillamonster @LiamMaguren I can’t do everything for them. @FlicksNZ doesn’t help showcase one-offs either.
@dillamonster @LiamMaguren But I don’t check every day.
@dillamonster @LiamMaguren WIND TOTEM not showing on my @FlicksNZ app. SHADOWS, BUSAN passed me by and I _do_ pay attention.
@LiamMaguren You don’t live here, do you? 19 screens down thanks to #eqnz and no history of Asian language films playing here.
@LiamMaguren when you say NZ I think you mean Auckland.
@Jacobunny @harrismint A’ight then.
@Jacobunny @harrismint Why do we need new captures? I have WALKSHORT and LOUNGE BAR on DVD already.
@Sportsfreakconz @peterdarlington I always thought he was more up for a laugh than media gave him credit for.… https://t.co/QCIC9w5Sdr
@Reesiepie Nice work, saying what I struggled to say in about 20 mins on the podcast.
@mistertodd Doesn’t he have to find coal mine jobs for every one the EPA lets go?
@SarahMcMullanNZ @CMRanapia Saw one tweet suggesting that it was going to take 80 years before balance was restored.
@Sportsfreakconz @peterdarlington @KloppGoff @campbellrapley If they’d held on for one more season we’d have an Apple TV app. Perfect.
@Sportsfreakconz @peterdarlington @KloppGoff @campbellrapley <waking up> I yearn for the days of PLP even though I complained at the time.
If @MatthewHootonNZ wasn’t irritating enough, he went to Park City during #Sundance and didn’t even know there was a film festival on.
Luckily got the last one - front row. @ Light House Cuba https://t.co/6niTMlnp1N
If anyone was in any doubt about the need for #52FilmsByWomen https://t.co/MyzdilQiDd
@SteveJoll I had a kererū smash in to our lounge room window for similar delusional reasons.
@badtom It’s as if they know they don’t have much time.
@ExWHUemployee @WinstonReid2 Not much wrong with his passing the other night. 50yd cross-field pass to pick out Cresswell early on.
Reached the conclusion that, as a reviewer, saying something has been done better before isn’t helpful unless you also say where and when.
@MatthewHootonNZ Isn’t Sundance week the most expensive time to visit Park City? Seen many films?
For the first 7 minutes of yr commute home, here’s my chat with @meganjwhelan about #50FilmsByWomen from this arvo. https://t.co/KDhesdLZpV
I’m at @radionz to talk #52FilmsByWomen with @meganjwhelan on @JMulliganRNZ in about fifteen minutes. 101FM or online.
@geekboy73 Have you tried to buy fish and chips again?
@GrumpyYetAmusin @inpoco “adjacent”. Thank you. The word I never quite put my finger on.
@peterdarlington @hudsie42 Get over yourself and join this post-Payet future where we are top 10 and four points off 7th.
@peterdarlington @hudsie42 MySky is the only thing that makes it work. Except when we are delayed for 12 hours…
@ShaneHarmon @Tegal1234 @Sportsfreakconz @p_l_pass never* let me down but @beINSPORTS_NZ makes me wait for hours/days. (*not quite)
@kaileyinNZ @LionMovie I know, right?
@peterdarlington @hudsie42 Now all your kids have left home you owe it to yourself to get Sky/Bein and rejoin us. Share our pain!
@hudsie42 Boro won’t go down so he’s only going to get more expensive.
Was selfishly off-grid to avoid @WestHamUtd spoilers and only now getting a sense of how big the #WomensMarch has been. Could not be happier
If we’re going to go Sunday-Sunday then this time last year I was getting married. Never not going to thank the fates for making that happen
@hudsie42 @peterdarlington Didn’t watch until 4.30. We should spend Payet money on Traoré.
Attn @beINSPORTS_NZ - once again West Ham not one of your live HD games. Spread it around a bit please. https://t.co/M1hsrYPnwF
@rajeevfilm The Steve Martin/Michael Caine was a remake of BEDTIME STORY (1964) with Brando/Niven.
@meconism Umm. Free chicken.
@meconism Also, was hoping it was dead so we could roast it.
America! The checks and balances you’ve been so proud of for as long as I’ve been alive turn out not to mean shit.
This is a great film. Trust me. https://t.co/MURT5KpP7T
Is Rebel Wilson playing the Brando part? https://t.co/OwDEdFb0GG
@shaxhuxmo There wasn’t enough Rey in the shops. https://t.co/eDUPgr9DeG Capitalism deciding it’s own outcome.
@_kellydare Turn up when you want to start every day. Or later. Expectations are important. Leave when you want to leave every day.
@publicaddress Not to mention how disastrous that would be for the 300m Chinese out of poverty.
@davidehrlich Or someone who spent high school practising his signature.
This is as depressing as anything I’ve read this week and yet will be glossed over in comparison with the “big” “da… https://t.co/9ARgK4bISb
@Chef_Du_Plunge I should introduce you to W.C. Fields: https://t.co/glcxmLWVxd
He said “going forward”. Impeach!! https://t.co/3I6OEFRzKl
@rajeevfilm Used to annoy the shit out of my friends by channeling Pesci from that film.
In which I recommend a film and a streaming service. If you haven’t tried @mubinzl you really should. https://t.co/riHTG0i0ZR
@GrumpyYetAmusin Was there anything for THE PRINCESS AND THE FROG (which I really liked but wasn’t a big hit)? https://t.co/mJyIEWsLIR
I guess what I’m wondering is whether that is a good or bad omen for 2017. https://t.co/MvDXFAfjTk
Yesterday a kererū flew into our lounge window, fell stunned to the ground, shook off a few feathers and then sat in a tree to recover.
Current top story on https://t.co/ATHXruWpTA: “Melbourne Victory unstoppable right now: FBK“. Guess not. https://t.co/nS6xxeajbx
Looks like @WgtnPhoenixFC playing without a goalkeeper tonight. Mossy doesn’t make it out for the handshakes.
@louis_slugso @JayHarvie He’s nearly 30, never had much pace or work rate and needs a slower league. #cashin
@JayHarvie @louis_slugso We’re asking 45m, will take 30m and paid 9m. Cash in and keep us up.
Out of interest, for NZers doing #52FilmsByWomen this year, THE BYE BYE MAN not on the current release schedule. https://t.co/Li0lQxIvCd
@Christoph_Elena Make another film and you’ll be the auteur you want to be.
@Christoph_Elena Re: your actual question, go to film school and you’ll make a decent living making commercials and series television.
@Christoph_Elena I think the lesson is, be careful what you wish for. You might get it.
@hudsie42 @peterdarlington @Sportsfreakconz Demanding g a pay rise because of Brexit was a bit on the nose, though, eh?
@peterdarlington @hudsie42 He’s dead to me now. (Unless he pulls his head in of course.)
@Christoph_Elena … combined with “I need a new dream.” I can’t imagine making a living in something as inane as commercial radio now.
@Christoph_Elena I discovered that being a commercial radio DJ wasn’t what it was cracked up to be. So, a little bit of disappointment…
The giant Ovation of the Seas is back in Wellington for a day. I took a tour on behalf of @wellingtonista:… https://t.co/O2I2pSOWJb
@WestHamUtd Watched @Michailantonio give up his track suit top for a cold mascot pre-match. What a gent. Knew we were going to be OK.
@Christoph_Elena I got what I wanted at 21. So chucked it in to go and do something else.
@DylanReeve @realDonaldTrump How many times in the last 12 months have we thought, “My god, he doesn’t even want to be president!”
Friday night’s Hollywood at Home (with @GaryRocketman) was MAD MAX: FURY ROAD. Tonight, Mizoguchi’s UGETSU (1953). You should live here.
@FPayne100 @NZCricketMuseum Worst hundred he ever scored according to the man himself. Apologised to us all afterwards.
Also, phone tried twice to autocorrect ‘Dmitri’ to ‘Emitting’ so even my phone has forgotten all about him. https://t.co/HqNFNxuNfN
Dmitri who? https://t.co/HqNFNxuNfN
@rajeevfilm @kaileyinNZ And it will get one. @GaryRocketman left us the book (by mistake) and K is reading it at the moment. I’m next.
@CherylBernstein Serves you right for not checking Finerals & Snakes first. https://t.co/nFSqnoPqcl
Last time we were here was pre-Kaikoura earthquake and Ernie was still manager. Weather hasn’t improved much.
We’re season tix holders at the @WgtnPhoenixFC but due to #eqnz, turf relaying and being away at NYE, this is our 1st game since early Nov.
